summary: Completed testing of new features: 1) Apple Sign In REMOVED from auth page (only Google and Facebook remain), 2) AI Chat Support with floating button and dialog working (5 tokens per message), 3) Social Share buttons for Facebook, X (Twitter), TikTok, Instagram all present and functional

auth_page_apple_removed.description: Apple Sign In button successfully REMOVED from /auth page

ai_chat_support.floating_button: Present at bottom-right of dashboard with data-testid='chat-support-btn'
dialog_elements: Quick questions (How do I teach my dog to sit?, Why does my dog bark at strangers?, Best treats for training?, How to stop leash pulling?)

social_share.location: Dashboard right sidebar - 'Spread the Word!' card

buttons_verified.note: Opens profile page (no direct share API)
Opens profile page (no direct share API)

mocked_apis.Facebook Login: Shows toast 'Facebook Login coming soon! Use Google or email for now.'
mocked_apis.TikTok Share: Opens TikTok profile page instead of direct share (TikTok has no web share API)
mocked_apis.Instagram Share: Opens Instagram profile page instead of direct share (Instagram has no web share API)

critical_code_review_comments: AI Chat Support properly implements token deduction before generating response
Fallback responses provided if AI service fails - good error handling
All social share buttons have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Chat dialog properly shows token balance and cost per message
seed_data_creation: Added 50 tokens to test user for chat API testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features working: Apple removed, AI Chat with 5 token cost, Social share buttons for FB/X/TikTok/Instagram. Facebook login MOCKED (shows toast). TikTok/Instagram share open profile pages (no direct share API). Test user has tokens available for future testing.
